title: Design Thinking-Based Innovative Business Education: Integrated Interaction Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business theory and practical experience in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Integration of modular digital learning content with real-time collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world business problems by applying the Design Thinking 3I Model (Inspiration-Ideation-Implementation)
Learners can integrate analytical thinking and creative problem-solving skills through microlearning content delivered on mobile platforms
Learners can establish management strategies from a multidisciplinary perspective through digital collaborative activities with peers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
